briefTitle: Omega-3 Fatty Acids for Prevention of Post-Operative Atrial Fibrillation
officialTitle: (OPERA)Randomized Clinical Trial to Examine Whether Peri-operative Intake of n-3 Polyunsaturated Fatty Acids Will Reduce the Occurrence of Post-operative Atrial Fibrillation in Patients Undergoing Cardiac Surgery
summary: This is a large multi-center study to examine whether peri-operative intake of n-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids (PUFA) will reduce the occurrence of post-operative atrial fibrillation or flutter (AF) in patients undergoing cardiac surgery (CS).

primaryOutcome.measure: Any First Post-op Atrial Fibrillation or Flutter (AF)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: up to 10 days post-surgery or discharge, whichever sooner
